channel.title: Day 2: Operations on hypathia.net

item.title: Service Mesh (WIP)
item.description: Introduction A Service Mesh allows Candidates are Linkerd, which is already build into some parts of Kubernetes, and Conduit, which is especially lightweight. For both a multi-tenancy analysis and concept are missing as of yet. Further Links Alternatives Linkerd Conduit Istio
